content: Kadeesh Kadeesh Kadeesh Moriyo Aloho Hailsano Hav dam'leen Shmayo varvo men Teshbahose Ooshane bamarome
/tBreek deso vose bashmeh d'Moriyo Aloho Teshubuhatho bamarome:

Kadeeshath Aloho
M’Kadhshono De Kadheeshe
Kadeeshath Hailthono
M’Hailono De Dhashleethe
Kadeeshath Lomoyooso
Yohab Kudhshala Kadeeshe
Theshlebthme Thoolosan
Esaraham Melain

Moran Esaraham Melain
Moran’u hu’sraheim Melain
Moran Kabel Thesmeshthan
Valsalavosan Esarahm Melain

Shubaholok Aloho
Shubaholok Booroyo
Shubaholok Mol Kamsheehsho ‘De Hoyen
La’ Haathoye Abdhaik Barekmor

Aboon d'bashmaayo. Nesadash shmokh teethe malkoothokh. Nehwe seb'yoonokh aykano d'bashmaayo w'af barvo. Hablan lahmo d'soonkonan yowmono. Washboqlan hawbayn w'hattohayn. Aykanan dofhnan shbaqan l'hayobayn. Lo tha'lan l'nesyoono. Elo faso'n men beeso. Methool d'deelokh he malkooso w'haylo w'teshbookhto lolam olmeen. Ameen.
